faq.question: Can I test Mist.io for free?
faq.answer: Yes. Just sign up and get started; we don’t require a credit card. There is a 5 machine limit. If you exceed this limit you will be required to upgrade to a paid plan.

faq.question: Do the plans work with my public cloud and on premises infrastructure?
faq.answer: Yes. You can manage your IaaS accounts, plus bare metal and container infrastructure all from a single interface.

faq.question: How many teams and users can I have?
faq.answer: Our RBAC is based on GitHub’s organization model. This means you can have 1 organization per paid plan with unlimited teams and users. Additional organizations can be added by users.

faq.question: What type of support do I get?
faq.answer: All paid plans include email support with 2 working days response time. Upgrade options are available upon request. Please contact [sales@mist.io](mailto:sales@mist.io) to learn more.

faq.question: Do the plans include monitoring?
faq.answer: Yes. The plans include a limited amount of monitoring data points. Ιf you need a full-scale monitoring solution, contact [sales@mist.io](mailto:sales@mist.io) to help you with pricing.

faq.question: Do you offer discounts?
faq.answer: Yes. You can receive a discount by making an annual prepayment or annual commitment.
